entry.title: 3M FT1000NF-52GAL-NEU - 3M Fast Tack Water Based Adhesive 1000NF FT1000NF-52GAL-NEU 7000046560
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 4394.92

[shortdesc]

3M Fast Tack Water Based Adhesive 1000NF

  • 3M™ Fast Tack Water Based Adhesive 1000NF is a water-based adhesive that offers a fast bonding time
  • It is heat-resistant, repositionable and adheres to many surfaces with high ultimate strength
  • This non-flammable, polychloroprene-free adhesive is 48% solids, and provides up to three times more coverage than solvent-based adhesives
  • It adheres to many types of flexible foam, latex foams, fabric, polyester fibrefill, canvas, wood, plywood, particleboard, and many plastic and metal surfaces
  • It is certified to GREENGUARD Product Emission Standard For Children and Schools for low-emitting interior building materials.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Fast bonding.
  • Stable bond provides good heat resistance for long-term endurance
  • Solventless, one-part adhesive requires no mixing for safe, easy handling
  • Low overspray and high coverage minimizes waste
  • Bonds a wide variety of substrates with high temperature resistance to meet a wide variety of needs
  • Colour: Neutral

Type:

[shortdesc]

3M Neoprene Contact Adhesive 10 Light Yellow, 1 Gallon, 4 per case

  • 3M™ Neoprene Contact Adhesive 10 is a versatile, solvent-based adhesive
  • It offers good heat resistance, and is commonly used for bonding most metals and plastics
